text: Ram Naresh Yadav (1 July 1928 â€“ 22 November 2016) was an Indian politician. He was Chief Minister of Uttar Pradesh from 1977 to 1979. He was from Janata Party; later he joined the Congress. He also was Governor of Madhya Pradesh from 26 August 2011 to 7 September 2016. ==References== Category:1928 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Governors of Chhattisgarh Category:Governors of Madhya Pradesh
title: Ram Naresh Yadav
